titleStmt.title: A full enquiry into the power of faith, the nature of prophecy, the translation of Enoch and Elias, and the resurrection of Christ
titleStmt.author: Freke, William, 1662-1744.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to William Freke. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
